author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MILTON EXPECTED TO STRENGTHEN QUICKLY... ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING IMPACTS INCREASING FOR PORTIONS OF THE FLORIDA WEST COAST...
summary:
...MILTON EXPECTED TO STRENGTHEN QUICKLY... ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING IMPACTS INCREASING FOR PORTIONS OF THE FLORIDA WEST COAST...
 As of 10:00 PM CDT Sat Oct 5
 the center of Milton was located near 22.9, -95.1
 with movement NNE at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Milton (AT4/AL142024)
